txt_en: You have every right to a beautiful life.
txt_cn: 你值得拥有属于你的美丽人生。
author: Selena Gomez

txt_en: There is no friend as loyal as a book.
txt_cn: 好书如挚友，情谊永不渝。
author: 海明威

txt_en: They can because they think they can.
txt_cn: 他们可以，是因为他们相信自己可以。
author: Virgil

txt_en: I have found that if you love life, life will love you back.
txt_cn: 我发现，如果你爱生活，生活也会用爱来回报你。
author: Arthur Rubinstein

txt_en: Forgiveness does not change the past, but it does enlarge the future.
txt_cn: 宽恕无法改变过去，却能拓宽未来。
author: Paul Boese

txt_en: We have to do the best we are capable of. This is our sacred human responsibility.
txt_cn: 我们必须尽力而为，这是我们生而为人的神圣责任。
author: 阿尔伯特·爱因斯坦

txt_en: The worst loneliness is not to be comfortable with yourself.
txt_cn: 最糟糕的孤独是无法舒适地和自己相处。
author: 马克·吐温

txt_en: That's what I consider true generosity. You give your all, and yet you always feel as if it costs you nothing.
txt_cn: 我认为，真正的慷慨是奉献所有，却仍觉得没有损失分毫。
author: 西蒙娜·德·波伏娃

txt_en: Be as simple as you can be. You'll be astonished to see how uncomplicated and happy your life will be.
txt_cn: 尽量简单做自己，你就会惊奇地发现，生活是如此简单而且快乐。
author: 《乔布斯》

txt_en: Today is your opportunity to build the tomorrow you want.
txt_cn: 想要创造出明天，今天就是你的机会。
author: Ken Poirot

txt_en: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
txt_cn: 相信自己能成功，你就已经成功了一半。
author: Theodore Roosevelt

txt_en: Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud.
txt_cn: 试着去成为别人乌云里的一道彩虹吧！
author: Maya Angelou

txt_en: Change the way you look at things and the things you look at change.
txt_cn: 改变你看待事物的方式，你所看到的事物也会改变。
author: Wayne W. Dyer

txt_en: I have failed many times, and that's why I am a success.
txt_cn: 我失败过很多次，这就是我成功的原因。
author: 迈克尔·乔丹

txt_en: There is an applause superior to that of the multitudes: one's own.
txt_cn: 有一种掌声，比大众的掌声更优裕：那就是你自己给自己鼓的掌。
author: Elizabeth Elton Smith

txt_en: Summer friends will melt away like summer snows, but winter friends are friends forever.
txt_cn: 盛夏的朋友会像盛夏的雪一样融化流逝，但数九寒天的朋友会是永远的朋友。
author: 《权力的游戏》

txt_en: Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet.
txt_cn: 忍耐是痛苦的，但果实是甜蜜的。
author: 亚里士多德

txt_en: Bear in mind that you should conduct yourself in life as at a feast.
txt_cn: 要记住，你在生活中应该表现得像出席宴会一样优雅。
author: Epictetus

txt_en: We cannot choose the day or time when we will fully bloom. It happens in its own time.
txt_cn: 我们无法选择自己盛开的时日。时候到了，它就会发生的。
author: Denis Waitley

txt_en: A lot of people are afraid to say what they want. That's why they don't get what they want.
txt_cn: 很多人想要却不敢开口，这就是为什么他们想要却得不到。
author: 麦当娜

txt_en: Well-timed silence has more eloquence than speech.
txt_cn: 适时的静默比雄辩更有说服力。
author: Martin Fraquhar Tupper

txt_en: A tiny change today brings a dramatically different tomorrow.
txt_cn: 今天的微小改变，会带来全然不同的明天。
author: Richard Bach

txt_en: Family means no one gets left behind or forgotten.
txt_cn: 家意味着没有人会被落下，或被遗忘。
author: David Ogden Stiers

txt_en: We love life, not because we are used to living but because we are used to loving.
txt_cn: 我们热爱生活，并不因为我们习惯了生活，而是因为我们习惯了去热爱。
author: 弗里德里希·尼采

txt_en: In the midst of winter, I found there was, within me, an invincible summer.
txt_cn: 在隆冬，我终于知道，我的内心有一个不可战胜的夏天。
author: 阿尔贝·加缪

txt_en: Success doesn't come from what you do occasionally. It comes from what you do consistently.
txt_cn: 成功并不来自你偶然做了什么，而是你一直在做什么。
author: Marie Forleo

txt_en: Keep a little fire burning; however small, however hidden.
txt_cn: 让心中的火苗一直燃烧吧，不管那有多微弱，不管藏得有多深。
author: Cormac McCarthy

txt_en: I'm not telling you it is going to be easy, I'm telling you it's going to be worth it.
txt_cn: 我不会告诉你这个过程很容易。我只会说，这一切都是值得的。
author: Art Williams

txt_en: Love is the one thing that transcends time and space.
txt_cn: 爱是唯一可以超越时空的东西。
author: 《星际穿越》
